SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Interface ViewController

All Known Implementing Classes:
CLIController, GUIController
public interface ViewController
The ViewController interface defines the methods for updating and interacting with the game's view. Implementing classes should provide implementations for these methods to handle various view-related tasks.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    askNumPlayers()
    Asks the view to prompt the user for the number of players.
    void
    getPlayerChoice(boolean yourTurn, String menuChoice)
    Asks the view to get the player's choice from a menu of options.
    void
    receiveMessages(List<Message> messages)
    Receives a list of messages and updates the view accordingly.
    void
    serverError(String message)
    Notifies the view about a server error with the given error message.
    void
    setNickname(String nickname)
    Sets the nickname for the current player.
    void
    showEndingScreen()
    Shows the ending screen of the game.
    void
    start(ClientImpl client, Server server)
    Starts the game view with the provided client and server instances.
    void
    updatedPlayerList(List<String> players)
    Updates the player list displayed in the view.
    void
    updateGame(GameUpdate update)
    Updates the game state with the provided game update.

  • Method Details

    • updatedPlayerList

      void updatedPlayerList(List<String> players)
      Updates the player list displayed in the view.
      Parameters:
      players - A list of player names.

    • updateGame

      void updateGame(GameUpdate update)
      Updates the game state with the provided game update.
      Parameters:
      update - The game update containing the new state of the game.

    • serverError

      void serverError(String message)
      Notifies the view about a server error with the given error message.
      Parameters:
      message - The error message indicating the server error.

    • askNumPlayers

      void askNumPlayers()
      Asks the view to prompt the user for the number of players.

    • setNickname

      void setNickname(String nickname)
      Sets the nickname for the current player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname to set for the current player.

    • getPlayerChoice

      void getPlayerChoice(boolean yourTurn, String menuChoice)
      Asks the view to get the player's choice from a menu of options.
      Parameters:
      yourTurn - A flag indicating whether it is the player's turn.
      menuChoice - The available options for the player to choose from.

    • start

      void start(ClientImpl client, Server server)
      Starts the game view with the provided client and server instances.
      Parameters:
      client - The client implementation used for communication with the server.
      server - The server instance responsible for managing the game logic.

    • showEndingScreen

      void showEndingScreen()
      Shows the ending screen of the game.

    • receiveMessages

      void receiveMessages(List<Message> messages)
      Receives a list of messages and updates the view accordingly.
      Parameters:
      messages - The list of messages to be displayed in the view.
